content: परि(री)वेशः(षः) {@--1@} Waiting at meals, distributing food, serving up meals. {@--2@} A circle, circlet, halo (of lustre &c.); <ls>R. 5. 74</ls>, <ls n="R.">6. 13</ls>; <ls>Śi. 5. 52</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">17. 9.</ls> {@--3@} Especially, the halo round the sun or moon; लक्ष्यते स्म तदनंतरं रविर्बद्धभीमपरिवेषमंडलः <ls>R. 11. 59.</ls> {@--4@} The circumference of a circle. {@--5@} The disc of the sun or moon. {@--6@} Anything which surrounds or protects.
